metadata.title: CVE-2024-50382 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Botan before 3.6.0, when certain LLVM versions are used, hascompiler-induced secret-dependent control flow in lib/utils/ghash/ghash.cppin GHASH in AES-GCM. There is a branch instead of an XOR with carry. Thiswas observed for Clang in LLVM 15 on RISC-V.

criterions.comment: botan package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
oscar package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
